item.title: Tropical Storm ISABEL Forecast/Advisory Number 1
item.description:
Issued at 1300Z SAT SEP 06 2003 
ZCZC MIATCMAT3 ALL
TTAA00 KNHC DDHHMM
TROPICAL STORM ISABEL SPECIAL FORECAST/ADVISORY NUMBER   1
NWS TPC/NATIONAL HURRICANE CENTER MIAMI FL   AL132003
1300Z SAT SEP 06 2003
 
TROPICAL STORM CENTER LOCATED NEAR 14.0N  34.0W AT 06/1300Z
POSITION ACCURATE WITHIN  30 NM
 
PRESENT MOVEMENT TOWARD THE WEST OR 270 DEGREES AT  11 KT
 
ESTIMATED MINIMUM CENTRAL PRESSURE 1005 MB
MAX SUSTAINED WINDS  35 KT WITH GUSTS TO  45 KT.
34 KT....... 75NE  75SE  25SW  75NW.
12 FT SEAS.. 75NE  75SE  75SW  75NW.
WINDS AND SEAS VARY GREATLY IN EACH QUADRANT.  RADII IN NAUTICAL
MILES ARE THE LARGEST RADII EXPECTED ANYWHERE IN THAT QUADRANT.
 
REPEAT...CENTER LOCATED NEAR 14.0N  34.0W AT 06/1300Z
AT 06/0600Z CENTER WAS LOCATED NEAR 14.0N  32.7W
 
FORECAST VALID 06/1800Z 14.0N  35.0W
MAX WIND  40 KT...GUSTS  50 KT.
34 KT... 75NE  75SE  25SW  75NW.
 
FORECAST VALID 07/0600Z 14.0N  37.5W
MAX WIND  45 KT...GUSTS  55 KT.
34 KT... 75NE  75SE  75SW  75NW.
 
FORECAST VALID 07/1800Z 14.5N  40.0W
MAX WIND  55 KT...GUSTS  65 KT.
50 KT... 25NE  25SE  25SW  25NW.
34 KT... 75NE  75SE  75SW  75NW.
 
FORECAST VALID 08/0600Z 15.0N  42.5W
MAX WIND  65 KT...GUSTS  80 KT.
50 KT... 30NE  30SE  30SW  30NW.
34 KT... 75NE  75SE  75SW  75NW.
 
FORECAST VALID 09/0600Z 15.5N  46.5W
MAX WIND  65 KT...GUSTS  80 KT.
50 KT... 30NE  30SE  30SW  30NW.
34 KT... 75NE  75SE  75SW  75NW.
 
EXTENDED OUTLOOK. NOTE...ERRORS FOR TRACK HAVE AVERAGED NEAR 275 NM
ON DAY 4 AND 375 NM ON DAY 5...AND FOR INTENSITY NEAR 20 KT EACH DAY
 
OUTLOOK VALID 10/0600Z 16.5N  50.0W
MAX WIND  65 KT...GUSTS  80 KT.
 
OUTLOOK VALID 11/0600Z 17.5N  54.5W
MAX WIND  65 KT...GUSTS  80 KT.
 
REQUEST FOR 3 HOURLY SHIP REPORTS WITHIN 300 MILES OF 14.0N  34.0W
 
NEXT ADVISORY AT 06/1500Z
 
FORECASTER AVILA
item.author: jason.fleming@seahorsecoastal.com
